content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with a gentleman named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The landlord, Mr. Schmidt, was looking for a monthly rent of 550 Euro, while I, as a student, could offer only 450 Euro. The price was too high for me, and we could not find a common ground.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you rate the negotiation partner as a 10?
name: Evaluator

content: I rated the negotiation partner as a 10 because Mr. Schmidt was polite, respectful, and straightforward in his communication. He was clear about his expectations and was also understanding of my position as a student.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
